+mundotgp hahhahaha adooorei!!!! que droga, pq tiraram o video?? queria

comments.author: alice5753

comments.text:
+alice5753 eles retiraram o vídeo do canal onde o Tauzing participa de um 
trecho do jogo cenas improváveis, foi mais ou menos assim:
Titulo da cena: Piores coisas para se ler em sua certidão de nascimento.
Tauszing então levanta a mão lá do lugar onde ele fica e o Guilherme Tomé 
que tava de Mestre de cerimonia dá a oportunidade para ele apresentar a sua 
ideia, enquanto isso o Elidio gritava :
_Não,não!! kkkkk.
Tauszing vai á frente, mesmo tímido, faz um gesto com as mãos dando a 
entender que está segurando a certidão de nascimento e lê o que está 
escrito nela :
_Filho de Jozé... ou Marcos... ou Fábio ou ...
Todos pulam de alegria e abraçados por ele ter conseguido mandar uma ideia 
engraçada. :D espero que tenha entendido
comments.author: mundotgp

comments.text:
+alice5753 Lembro que era um vídeo curto (acho que de propaganda), e ele 
faz uma piada com algo do tipo "Coisas improvaveis de ler na certidão de 
nascimento"

captions.text:
Let's do "Blind Freeze" now.
How does it work?
Andy and Oscar will start a scene

and every time I say 'freeze',
a player from outside the scene

will step in and transform
the scene into another one

and we will keep freezing and
transforming through different scenes.

To do the "Blind Freeze", I'll pick up a place.
Give me a place, you, in the back...

- Mental hospital!
- 'Mental hospital', okay.

"Blind Freeze", 'mental hospital', whenever
I say 'freeze', they will transform,
starting now!
Easy... Easy... Easy...

Sector two, he's in sector two,
I found him!

I'm alone here,
I don't know if he'll react!

- You see, you're the crazy one!
- No, I'm not!

- I have a seringe!
- Freeze!

And the puppet says:
'Hi! How are you? I'm gonna tap dance'!
Freeze!
Freeze!
Oh, you hit me!

- Damn right!
- Freeze!

Look at that sun!
It's casting some major shadows!

- I feel like doing some jumps!
- Freeze!

Look, that's when the player
did the slide tackle!

It was a reckless
slide tackle! Reckless!

Let's rewind the tape!
Let's go!
Going back...

Forward. Look at the
moment of the slide tackle.

Rewind!
Let's rewind the tape.

- Recklessness in the soccer fields!
What a shame! - Freeze!

Then you stretch it... And you
put it on the plastic bottle... See?

I got it, that's easy,
right Polly?

- Easy, any moron can to this!
- You put it...
Freeze!

I'm the only one with a real
musical instrument here.
Freeze!
Tauszig...
Oh, no!
Why, why?

Thank you, ladies and gentlemen,
that was "Blind Freeze"!
We end it before it goes south...

You don't get paid to be any more
embarassed than you already are.

So much talent he reserves
just for the music, right?

And he came to me
with a pity hug...
#despair, actually.

CIA. BARBIXAS DE HUMOR
presented

IMPROVÁVEL
Probably a good show.

What are the thoughts
of a curtain?
